briefdescription.para: The name of the player.
The name of the artist for the currently playing media item.
The name of the album for the currently playing track.
The name of the currently playing track.
The playing state of the application.

simplesect.para: false if the application is stopped
true if the application is playing or paused

briefdescription.para: The paused state of the application.

simplesect.para: false if the application is not paused
true if the application is paused

briefdescription.para: The repeat state for playback.

detaileddescription.para: The repeat state for playback. This can be one of three values: 0 - no repeat 1 - repeat the current track forever 2 - repeat the current playlist forever

briefdescription.para: Shuffle state for playback.

detaileddescription.para: This will be true if shuffle is enabled, false if not.

briefdescription.para: The location of playback within the current media, in milliseconds.
The volume on a range from 0 to 255.
The mute state.

detaileddescription.para: True if muted or the volume is set to 0, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: The collection of commands associated with the current page.
The current web playlist.
Bind an observer to get called on changes to Songbird metadata/state.
Remove an observer from the metadata key.
Download the item passed in.
Download all items in a MediaList.
Download only the selected elements from a WebPlaylist.
Begin playback at the current location.
Play an media file by URL.
Stop playback. Sets position to beginning.
Stop playback, leaves position at current location.
Skip to the next track and begin playing.
Skip to the previous track and begin playing.
Get the site scope.
Fires the event to the webpage.

memberdef.argsstring: (in AString aClass, in AString aType, in sbIMediaItem aMediaItem, in long aStatus)
memberdef.name: fireMediaItemStatusEventToContent

briefdescription.para: Fires the media item status event to the webpage.
Forces the webplaylist to rescan it's commands.
Check if the code has access to a category.

briefdescription.para: This interface is a composition of many of our other interfaces with the goal of exposing a more web-friendly interface to web sites. This defines our "Remote API" the websites can call to get information about and interact with Songbird.
